Project name: DWP Fraud, Error and Debt (FED) Behaviour Change campaign (Phase ll) Interim Submission 2014/15
Basis for expenditure approval: Request to cover costs of appointing creative and research agencies to continue delivering this ongoing campaign, based on pilot results.  Additional request for provisional approval of c. ?2,000,000 to deliver subsequent planning and delivery work.

Project name: DWP Single Tier State Pension changes campaign 2014/15
Basis for expenditure approval: Activity to build awareness and understanding regarding the changes being made to the State Pension.
